name: Back to Cabinet !!
description:
<BlueArchive> Fan Game (feat. Hanaoka Yuzu)

Angry 'Yuuka'  has something to say to 'Yuzu'.

Please help 'Yuzu' get back to Game Development Department safely  !

Player Move : WASD  or  Arrow Key

Talk with NPC :  Space Bar

Pause Menu :  ESC

※ NPCs with speech balloons above their heads can communicate by pressing the space bar.

※ After a long cabinet life,' Yuzu', who has become dull, can only move up, down, left and right in four directions.

※ Sometimes 'Yuuka' gets stuck on the wall. That means, you're luck. So don't worry, Just fly to the destination!

※ When you encounter an enemy, you become invincible for two seconds and time slows down. Please take a good look at the surroundings at this time.

Have Fun~
